level.text: Transfers of assets from an energy utility to an affiliate must be recorded on the utility’s books at the greater of net book cost or market value. Transfers of assets from an affiliate to the energy utility shall be at the lesser of net book cost or market value. Such asymmetric pricing shall not apply to any transaction resulting from a competitive bidding process.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 1109, 1114 (February 4, 2011).
